Karan Ahuja

Karan is a restless tech enthusiast dreaming about changing the world. He loves to solve problems and thinks problems are the food for an entrepreneur's surv ival. He is interested in everything. Maths and science are always a calling. His mission in life is to be a "strong maker". He wants to be a yogi to accelerate learning and change the world for abundance, peace and joy.
